channel.title: How do i make a "safe spot"

item.title: How do i make a "safe spot"
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Here’s a tutorial that I Br3ndan I gave me. Works great.

[code]Purpose : To make safezones in Pimpscape and all it’s children, Phonescape etc.

Difficulty : 2/10

Procedure
Step 1 : First of all we need to find the boolean. Search for this in client.java
Code:
public boolean nonWild
You should see something like this below that
Code:
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=3456 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3249 && absY <=3327 )||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}
Step 2 : Now that you’ve found the boolean, we can add the safezone! This is the format you use when making one
Code:
(absX >= [X Coords here SW] && absX <= [X Coords here NE] && absY >= [Y Coords here SW] && absY <=[Y Coords here NE] ) ||

Step 3 : Save client.java and compile, congratulations on just making a safezone!

Credits : Me and n0vamage

Additional Information : If you didn’t understand step 2, then pay attention!

The way safezones work is… You work out the most SW (South-Western) coords of the area you wan’t to make a safezone and add the X coords in the 1st place, put the Y coords of them in the last one. For the NE (North-Eastern) part of the safezone, you add the X coords of the position in the 2nd place and the 2nd last place.

Example : Say this square is you’re area that you wan’t to make a safezone.
__________
| | < NE Corner
| |
| |
| |
SW Corner >|________|

You’re adding in the SW corner’s coords and the NE coords so that the ‘safezone box’ can stretch out and cover the full area. Hope you understand now.

Moderators : You’ll find a tutorial on adding safezones in this section somewhere, there isn’t one for Pimpscape though, only for Testscape and the Testscape tutorial isn’t compatable with Pimpscape so, please think about all the people this might help before attempting to lock it. Please, I’m here to help and help I shall.

There’s one of my old tutorials. Hope it helped. [/code]

ALL CREDITS FOR THIS GO TO I BR3NDAN I!!! I DIDN’T MAKE THIS![br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 09:12:25 PM[/size][hr]And for ::range your going to have to make a few of those… cause it’s not facing a uhhh… I can’t remember the types of direction, but it’s facing a wierd direction, so make a few of them.
